name: Subocean Angler
description:
An Anti-Platformer Fishing Game created for Watch + Jam 3: This Time It's Garbage!

My first ever Game Jam submission :D

Play as the Subocean Anglerfish, apex predator and sole resident of the abyssal layer beneath the bounding box. Lure unsuspecting platformers to your watery realm by disabling their collisions and ruining their physics.

A "Complete" game with four "whole" levels and minimal bug testing!

INSTRUCTIONS:

WADS/ARROWS – move anglerfish
Hold Left Mouse – Charge and set lure
Left Mouse Once Lure Is Set - Spring your trap on platformers: first click will briefly disable collision detection*. Additional clicks will add more effects depending on Lure.
Right mouse – Retract lure.

Lure all the platformers out of bounds into the sub-ocean and eat them to clear the level.

*Eventually out of bounds characters will be discovered and respawned so click quickly and often whenever you have the chance, or watch the bug reports pile up.

ASSET CREDITS:

Character Sprite and Tile set – PIXEL ART METROIDVANIA ASSET PACK, O_LOBSTER
Water Shader Code – Sean Spalding
Picture of an Anglerfish – Murrays abyssal anglerfish, illustration by R. Mintern
Music – Cate by Cakeflaps & Memoraphile @ You're Perfect Studio
Font - Gimme Danger (First google result for "epic gamer font")
